data.Name: Volumes
data.Bio: Volumes is an American djent band from Los Angeles, California formed in 2009. Current members: Michael Barr - vocals, Myke Terry - vocals, Raad Soudani - bass, Nick Ursich - drums. Former members: Diego Farias (RIP), Gus Farias, Daniel Schwartz, Chris Khoury, Daniel Braunstein. The band started in 2009 when guitarists Diego Farias and Daniel Braunstein were writing music together. Singers Michael Barr and Diego's brother, Gus Farias, joined the band along with Raad Soudani on bass and Chris Khoury playing the drums. Read more on Last.fm
